title: Reconnect
body:
Hello there Riot and on-lookers, i am experiencing a  bug in which whenever i load a game, custom or normal, it will not go to loading screen, just stay in the client with the reconnect button. This is an annoying bug which i'm sure will pass next time an update comes up but i would prefer to avoid waiting for that opportunity. Any assistance anyone could provide would be greatly appreciated. 
Catspeare

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try running through the "[Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)" guide for me, let me know if anything helps.
